QueryResult.text: SELECT A.ID, A.ENTITY_ID, E.DESCRIPTION ENTITY, A.MAIN_ACCOUNT_ID || '-' || A.SUB_ACCOUNT_ID GL_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, A.MAIN_ACCOUNT_ID, A.SUB_ACCOUNT_ID, A.ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION, AC.NAME ACCOUNT_CLASS, A.ACCOUNT_CLASS ACCOUNT_CLASS_ID, AT.NAME ACCOUNT_TYPE, A.ACCOUNT_TYPE ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID, A.CAPITAL_EXPENSE, A.NONCASH_EXPENSE, A.OVERHEAD FROM CBK_GL_ACCOUNT A LEFT OUTER JOIN CMN_LOOKUPS_V AC ON A.ACCOUNT_CLASS = AC.ID AND AC.LANGUAGE_CODE = 'en' LEFT OUTER JOIN CMN_LOOKUPS_V AT ON A.ACCOUNT_TYPE = AT.ID AND AT.LANGUAGE_CODE = 'en' LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTITY E ON A.ENTITY_ID = E.ID WHERE (1=1)
